config_files.docker-compose.yml:
version: '3.7'
services:
  db:
    build:
      context: ./redis
    image: ${DOCKER_REGISTRY:-dccn}/redis
    user: root
    volumes:
      - ${STREAMER_DB_DATA_VOL}:/data
  service:
    build:
      context: ./streamer
    image: ${DOCKER_REGISTRY:-dccn}/streamer:${DOCKER_IMAGE_TAG:-latest}
    user: root
    environment:
      - REDIS_HOST=db
      - REDIS_PORT=6379
      - STREAMER_SERVICE_PORT=${STREAMER_SERVICE_PORT:-3001}
    volumes:
      - ${STREAMER_SERVICE_LOG_VOL}:/opt/streamer/log
      - ${STREAMER_SERVICE_CRON_VOL}:/cron
      - ${HOME_VOL}:/home:ro
      - ${PROJECT_VOL}:/project
      - ${PROJECT_CEPHFS_VOL}:/project_cephfs
    depends_on:
      - db
  ftp:
    build:
      context: ./streamer-ftp
    image: ${DOCKER_REGISTRY:-dccn}/streamer-ftp:${DOCKER_IMAGE_TAG:-latest}
    ports:
      - ${STREAMER_FTP_EXTERNAL_PORT:-2222}:22
    command: ${STREAMER_FTP_USERNAME:-streamer}:${STREAMER_FTP_PASSWORD:-streamer}:${STREAMER_FTP_UID:-1010}:${STREAMER_FTP_GID:-1010}:project
  ui:
    build:
      context: ./streamer-ui
    image: ${DOCKER_REGISTRY:-dccn}/streamer-ui:${DOCKER_IMAGE_TAG:-latest}
    environment:
      STREAMER_UI_AUTH_SERVER:
      STREAMER_UI_AUTH_CLIENT_ID:
      STREAMER_UI_AUTH_CLIENT_SECRET:
      STREAMER_UI_PDB_VERSION:
      STREAMER_UI_EXTERNAL_PORT:
      STREAMER_UI_BUFFER_DIR:
      STREAMER_URL_PREFIX:
      STREAMER_UI_DB_HOST:
      STREAMER_UI_DB_PORT:
      STREAMER_UI_DB_USER:
      STREAMER_UI_DB_PASSWORD:
      STREAMER_UI_DB_NAME:
      STREAMER_UI_DEBUG:
    depends_on:
      - service
      - ui-db
  ui-db:
    image: postgres:12-alpine
    environment:
      POSTGRES_HOST:
      POSTGRES_PORT:
      POSTGRES_USER:
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD:
      POSTGRES_DATABASE:
      GRAFANA_USER:
      GRAFANA_PASSWORD:
    volumes:
      - ${STREAMER_UI_DB_INIT_VOL}/01-initialize-database.sh:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/01-initialize-database.sh:ro
    restart: always
config_files.docker-compose.override.yml:
version: '3.7'
services:
  ui:
    build:
      context: ./streamer-ui
    image: ${DOCKER_REGISTRY:-dccn}/streamer-ui:${DOCKER_IMAGE_TAG:-latest}
    ports:
      - ${STREAMER_UI_EXTERNAL_PORT:-9000}:9000
    volumes:
      - ${STREAMER_UI_LOG_VOL}:/opt/streamer-ui-server/log
  ui-db:
    ports:
      - ${STREAMER_UI_DB_PORT:-5432}:${STREAMER_UI_DB_PORT:-5432}
    volumes:
      - /var/lib/postgresql/data
config_files.streamer-ui/Dockerfile:
# Build the static files
FROM node:16 as BUILD
WORKDIR /opt/streamer-ui-client
COPY $pwd/packages/client/package.json ./ 
COPY $pwd/packages/client/yarn.lock ./
RUN yarn install
COPY $pwd/packages/client/tsconfig.json ./
COPY $pwd/packages/client/.eslintrc.json ./
COPY $pwd/packages/client/*.less ./ 
COPY $pwd/packages/client/*.js ./ 
COPY $pwd/packages/client/src ./src
COPY $pwd/packages/client/public ./public
RUN yarn build

# Create the server
FROM node:16
ENV NODE_ENV production
RUN ulimit -n 1024 && apt-get update && apt-get install -y cron curl supervisor
WORKDIR /opt/streamer-ui-server
COPY $pwd/packages/server/package.json ./
COPY $pwd/packages/server/yarn.lock ./
RUN yarn install
COPY $pwd/packages/server/supervisord.conf ./
COPY $pwd/packages/server/purge-db.sh ./
COPY $pwd/packages/server/purge-all-db.sh ./
COPY $pwd/packages/server/start-server.sh ./
COPY $pwd/packages/server/start-cron.sh ./
COPY $pwd/packages/server/*.js ./
COPY $pwd/packages/server/bin ./bin
COPY $pwd/packages/server/routes ./routes
COPY $pwd/packages/server/config ./config
RUN ( chmod +x purge-db.sh )
RUN ( chmod +x purge-all-db.sh )
RUN ( chmod +x start-server.sh )
RUN ( chmod +x start-cron.sh )
COPY $pwd/packages/server/cron/crontab /etc/cron.d/purge-db
RUN ( chmod +x /etc/cron.d/purge-db && crontab /etc/cron.d/purge-db )
COPY --from=build /opt/streamer-ui-client/build /opt/streamer-ui-server/frontend
CMD [ "/usr/bin/supervisord", "-c", "/opt/streamer-ui-server/supervisord.conf" ]
